System requirements:
* 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor with 1 GHz.
* 1 GB of RAM.
* Support for DirectX 9 interface with the driver WDDM, at least 128 MB of graphics memory, Pixel Shader 2.0 in color and 32 bits / pixel.
Hard disk capacity of 40 GB to 16 GB of free disk space.

Description:
This assembly is the successor of Microsoft Windows 7 Build Enterprise SP1 IE10 + RUS-ENG x86-x64 KMS-activation. It differs from its predecessor is that the current assembly includes updates as of December 14, 2013, an activator replaced the more advanced version, plus fixes some bugs of the last release.

Composition
So, this assembly includes 4 Russian edition and 4 English version of Windows 7 SP1 32-bit (x86) and 64-bit (x64) kernel:

- Windows 7 Professional SP1 x86 Russian
- Windows 7 Professional SP1 x86 English
- Windows 7 Professional SP1 x64 Russian
- Windows 7 Professional SP1 x64 English
- Windows 7 Enterprise SP1 x86 Russian
- Windows 7 Enterprise SP1 x86 English
- Windows 7 Enterprise SP1 x64 Russian
- Windows 7 Enterprise SP1 x64 English

Efficiency of the assembly as far as possible carefully checked.

After installation, you get a fully registered and activated version of Windows 7, the chosen wording.

Some features of the assembly
- The original installer of Windows 7 is replaced by slightly redesigned installer from Windows 8.
- In the assembly of integrated all critical updates available as of December 14, 2013, including Internet Explorer 11.
- Instead of the default embedded with updates Microsoft. NET Framework 4 Client Profile in the assembly of integrated lightweight version. NET Framework 4.5.1 (project [Slim]. NET Framework 4.5.1 Full x86/x64).
- In the assembly of integrated Microsoft Visual C + + 2005, 2008, 2010, 2012 and 2013 Redistributable Package latest versions. To avoid duplicating install different applications earlier versions and redirect programs that require these packages libraries on recent versions, installing older versions locked plugs (project [addon] Microsoft Visual C + + 2005-2008-2010-2012-2013 Redistributable Package Hybrid).
- At the earliest stage of the installation has pre-load a menu where you can select the bit of the primary shell, that is what the installer is used, x86 or x64. Because of this, you should not worry that the 64-bit version of the OS can not stand up for RAID, and that users of 64-bit operating systems may be without service recovery system. For the most inquisitive: Do not attempt to install the 32-bit version of the OS with the 64-bit version - the final stage of deployment installer will throw an error and refuses to continue the installation.
- In the System Restore service that runs from the installation media, module is integrated Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (MSDaRT) 8.0.1, and recovery service that is built into the system - MSDaRT 7.0, which greatly expands the possibilities of resuscitation system.
- For technical reasons, from the System Restore launched from the installation media, excluded item "System Restore" allows to roll back the system to previously established control points.
- In the 32-bit version of System Restore, launched from the installation media, integrated program AntiSMS 4.1 for fast automatic blocker treatment and Trojans.
- After installation, the system will be activated built-in assembly activator, which is based on the method of activating a KMS-server.
- With the included assembly KMS-activator can activate not only Windows, but Office 2010 VL, and Office 2013 VL.
- If you choose to install Windows 7 Enterprise (Corporate), then after installation you will be able to switch the interface language from English to Russian and back standard means Windows 7 Enterprise (Corporate). If you installed Windows 7 Professional (Professional), you can use for this purpose utility Vistalizator, which is available in the shortcut in the start menu of Windows (Start Menu-> All Programs).
- For technical reasons, no system with this assembly can not be updated for Windows Vista / 7. However, if you must install from under the existing system, is able to initiate a so-called Custom installation. When you run the installation already running under 32-bit OS, it's simple. But to initiate the installation of under 64-bit OS, you do not start it via setup.exe in the root distribution media, and through setup.exe, which is located in the Sources folder distribution. Avtoran bootable media when running under an existing operating system, select the desired type of launch itself.

For more information about activation
For automatic activation system for mounting the assembly, it does not need the Internet - everything happens automatically in offline mode. This is possible, because the basis of the activator is KMScmd 3.02 Portable from Ratiborus and Evgeny972, which works on the principle of KMS-activated, but without the need for Internet access.

In the target system provides a mechanism for reactivation. It can be initiated by running the shortcut "Windows & Office KMS-activation" in the start menu of Windows (Start Menu-> All Programs). When you run this activator you get the choice to activate the system by a single start a local KMS-server by writing a delayed start activator scheduler with automatic reactivation every 25 days, or by using the remote KMS-server.

In the first case, the activator will activate just for a period of 180 days and cleaned up after themselves. Second, almost all the same, but the activator still be registered in the scheduler with automatic start every 25 days to reactivate the system without user intervention. The third method is left as an alternative to the local KMS-server and requires access to the Internet for their work.

I think you noticed that the label name "Windows & Office KMS-activation" means not only the ability to activate Windows, but Office. And this is partly true. Activator is able to activate Office 2010 VL and Office 2013 VL. Available activation mechanisms are similar to the mechanisms of activation Windows, described above. Except for the fact that the method of activation Windows, requiring for their work internet access to Office, I did not develop.

Tool kit
A set of tools Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (MSDaRT) helps to diagnose and troubleshoot the system arising from the start, as well as other problems.

The kit includes the following tools:

- Editing the registry. Utility Registry Editor ERD provides information about the registry, which can help in recovery.
- Restore access to the system. To display the local user accounts and change the passwords you can use the wizard to change passwords.
- Diagnosis of a system failure. To identify the causes of system failure and determine which driver caused the failure, you can use the wizard failure analysis.
- Recover deleted files. File recovery utility can be used to find and recover deleted files from the file system NTFS or FAT.
- Recovering partitions and volumes. To restore a partition or volume, you can use the application Disk Commander.
- Deleting data from disks or volumes. To delete the data on the disks and volumes, you can use the Disk Cleanup utility.
- Perform administrative tasks. Computer Management utility provides recovery tools for a wide range of administrative tasks.
- Browse titles. Utility Explorer lets you browse files and folders that are stored on different disks.
- Finding the right recovery tools. Master recommends making the most appropriate tool to remedy the situation, and provides step by step instructions for diagnostics.
- Configure TCP / IP. Utility Configuring TCP / IP helps to display and configure TCP / IP.
- Removal of patches and service packs Windows. By using the remote fixes can remove a Windows hotfix or service pack, which can not be run.
- Check and restore system files. System File Checker tool allows you to check and restore corrupted or missing system files.
- Search for specific files. Search utility allows you to limit your search by specifying the name, location search, the approximate size of the file or the file modification time.
- Standalone System. Individual means of checking to determine malware or other unwanted programs and provide warnings of potential danger.
- Remote connection. The possibility of establishing a remote connection service of those. Support for problem solving.

Get more detailed information about the tools included in the package, can be of help file, available in the main window MSDaRT.

Program AntiSMS
AntiSMS program is designed for automatic treatment of computer programs-extortionists, blockers and Trojans Trojan.Winlock, that block of Windows, requiring the user to send SMS to unlock the system. The program allows even inexperienced users to unlock Windows for 5 minutes and totally free. When the program starts AntiSMS, it automatically performs the necessary steps to treat the infected system.
